content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE customers_by_region
with(
    LOCATION = 'aggregated_data/',
    DATA_SOURCE = data_source_1,  
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
)  
AS
SELECT region, count(distinct(customer_id)) as disctinct_customers
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://miniproject3msktred.dfs.core.windows.net/globalmartdata/customers.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW= True,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) AS [r]
GROUP BY region
GO
select * from customers_by_region
